definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: twisted, perverted;—abs. [[וּפְתַלְתּׂל]] ´[[דּוֹר ע]] De 32:5 a generation twisted and crooked, ´[[לֵבָב ע]] Ps 101:4; as n.m. (of one devious in life) the perverted 2Sa 22:27 = Ps 18:27, Pr 22:5, of things Pr 8:8; cstr. [[דְּרָכַיִם]] ´[[ע]] Pr 28:6, [[שְׂפָתָיו]] ´[[ע]] Pr 19:1, [[עִקֶּשׁ־לֵב]] Pr 17:20; pl. [[אָרְחׂתֵיהֶם עִקְּשִׁים]] Pr 2:15 whose ways are twisted; cstr. [[עִקְּשֵׁי־לֵב]] Pr 11:20.
